Invocation Name: tamil bible
des:
Hello Alexa users,

Thanks for enabling the Tamil bible. The Tamil Bible skill is capable to play all chapters from all 66 books in the bible. So enjoy listening and provide your comments with feedback to improve.

Usage
Though the skill is to read the Tamil bible, the customers are requested to pronounce the book name in English for Alexa to recognize and play the respective chapter audio. 

Please say the bible book name and chapter number that you want to listen to. 
For eg:- If you want to listen to second kings chapter four, you have to say two king four.

If you are not sure about the total no.of chapter in the book then you can tell the book name. 
for eg:- If you want to listen first Thessalonians from chapter one, you have to say one Thessalonians. 

Sometime, it might be hard to pronounce the certain book name to Alexa, so instead of fighting with Alexa, you can say index number of book as in the bible order to listen from chapter 1. 
For eg:- say index number twenty-two to listen to the song of Solomon book from chapter 1. 

Please say the bible chpater and number that you want to listen"

Please refer to the below description for the index number of books and total numbers chapters in each book.
